name: SmartSync
tag_list: facebook, syncing, facebook-syncing, application, app, iphone
overview:
SmartSync keeps your iPhone contacts up-to-date with their latest profile pictures, information and checkins from Facebook.

In just a few minutes of setup you will be able to view your contacts latest profile pictures when they call you and when you call them.

SmartSync is able to sync with your contacts, even if you aren’t friends on Facebook. If you and a contact in your address book both have SmartSync installed, you will be able to see their Facebook profile photo and other information that they have chosen to share and make public.
